  *  upgrade node:alpine to 18 (7f6d3631)
  *  upgrade typescript to 4.7.2 (7417e295)

  *  add commit linting (7a2c3458)

* **release:**
  *  v2.2.1 (f22a4fa7)

*  update screenshots (68c67bf6)

* **frontend:**
